FuncDef:
The qos channel-profile command creates a channel profile.
The undo qos channel-profile command deletes a channel profile.
By default, no channel profile is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Name of a channel profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The bandwidth of user queues comprise a serial of discrete bandwidths. You can configure the bandwidth granularity and quantity for each discrete bandwidth so that bandwidth can be reasonably allocated to services on the live network. To create a channel profile, run the qos channel-profile command.
Precautions
The channel profile in use cannot be deleted.
